questions.question: After stopping at a traffic signal with a solid red light, you may:
choices: Turn right, unless prohibited by signs
Turn left on any street, unless prohibited by signs

questions.question: You have passed another vehicle. What should you see in your rear-view mirror before returning to the right lane?
choices: The other driver signaling that it is safe to return
The headlights of the vehicle you have passed

questions.question: You want to turn left ahead. There is a shared left turn lane in the center of the road. What should you do?
choices: Prepare for and make the turn from any lane
Make the turn sharply across the center lane
Enter the center lane while preparing for the turn

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
When two vehicles from different directions arrive at the same time at a four-way stop, which should have the right-of-way?
choices: The vehicle approaching from the right
The vehicle that is traveling faster

questions.question: When you drive through a construction zone, you should:
choices: Be prepared to slow down or stop
Slow down to watch the ongoing work
Decrease your following distance to any car ahead

questions.question: If someone is driving aggressively behind you:
choices: Speed up if the driver tries to pass you
Try to get out of the aggressive driver's way

questions.question: You meet a school bus that has stopped on the other side of the highway. The bus activates its flashing lights. When are you allowed to proceed without stopping?
choices: When the highway is divided with a median barrier

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
choices: There will be fewer lanes ahead
The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways
The divided highway on which you are traveling ends ahead

questions.question: If the RMV suspends or revokes your driver's license, you:
choices: May drive for 24 hours after being notified
May drive up to one week after being notified

questions.question: Signs with a fluorescent yellow-green color mark:
choices: Pedestrian and bicycle crossings, and school areas

questions.question: In general, visitors with a driver's license from a foreign country may drive in Massachusetts without a state driver's license, as long as:
choices: Their license is valid, and visit is shorter than 30 days
Their license is valid, and visit is shorter than one year

questions.question: You are driving on a one-way street. You may turn left onto another one-way street only if:
choices: Traffic on the street flows to the left
There is a sign permitting the turn
Traffic on the street flows to the right

questions.question: A license plate illuminating light is:
choices: Required on an emergency vehicle only

questions.question: You can park and leave your car in the following place:
choices: On a sidewalk that is not used

questions.question: When approaching a stationary emergency vehicle with flashing lights on an interstate, you must:
choices: Drive to the right-hand side and stop
Stay in your lane and keep your speed

questions.question: Which is true about combining alcohol with other drugs?
choices: It dramatically increases the negative effects
In general, it reduces the negative effects of alcohol
You cannot be charged with OUI

questions.question: The average time it takes to react to a situation and step on the brake pedal is:
In cold and wet weather, the roadways on bridges and overpasses:
choices: Freeze after the rest of the road does
Do not freeze because they are made of concrete
Freeze before the rest of the road does

questions.question: When should you use your high-beam headlights?
choices: In dark areas at night and when there are no oncoming vehicles
At night and when approaching another vehicle from behind

questions.question: If you drive past this sign:
choices: You must keep to the left
You have the right of way

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
choices: There is a work zone ahead
There is a bus stop ahead

questions.question: You are driving on a highway when a tire blows out on your vehicle. What should you do?
choices: Pump your brakes and slow to a stop on the highway
Not use the brake until you have the vehicle under control
Brake hard and steer to the right

questions.question: A vehicle carrying this sign attached to the back:
choices: Is required to stop at all railroad crossings

questions.question: You are following a vehicle at a safe distance on a wet road. Another driver overtakes you and pulls into the gap in front of you. What should you do?
choices: Drop back to keep a safe distance
Try to overtake safely as soon as you can
Stay close until the other vehicle moves on

questions.question: On cold, wet days, which roadways are most likely to freeze first?
What should you do when you see this sign?
choices: Drive to the right of a divider
Keep right unless you are passing another vehicle
Turn right at the intersection ahead

questions.question: If your car breaks down, you should:
choices: Get your vehicle off the road and away from traffic
Leave the car where it became disabled

questions.question: A driver must wear his seat belt:
choices: Even if the vehicle is equipped with airbags
Only when driving 12 mph or faster

questions.question: True or false? On a roadway separated by a physical barrier, you must stop for a school bus displaying flashing red lights and has stopped on the other side of the roadway.
When traffic control signals are blacked out and not functioning, you must proceed as if there is:
choices: A flashing yellow signal in your direction
A steady red light in your direction
A stop sign in all directions

questions.question: Why should you always be alert to motorcycles?
choices: Their size makes them very difficult to see

questions.question: When you park headed uphill and there is no curb, you should turn your front wheels:
choices: Parallel to and at least 18 inches away from the side of the road
Toward the side of the road
Parallel to and touching the curb

questions.question: To protect yourself from the mistakes of others, you should keep a cushion of space:
When following an emergency vehicle using sirens and flashing red lights, you must:
choices: Slow down to 25 mph or less

questions.question: Unless otherwise posted, the legal speed limit in a thickly settled or business district is:
If you are crossing a broken yellow line to pass, you must be able to see clearly at least:
If you are convicted of spraying paint or applying stickers or other graffiti, your driver's license may be suspended for:
Crossing a double solid yellow line on your left is:
choices: Allowed when turning left and when safe

questions.question: Which of these statements about drugs and driving is true?
choices: Only illegal drugs affect your driving skills
Almost any drug can affect your driving skills
Prescription drugs are safe to use if you don't feel drowsy

questions.question: If your wheels slip off the road edge, what is the best thing to do?
choices: Slow down, gently using the brakes, and steer back at a safe speed
Quickly jerk the steering wheel to get back onto the pavement
Speed up and steer back gradually

questions.question: When you become a Massachusetts resident, you must obtain a Massachusetts driver's license:
What does this sign mean?
choices: Always stop and proceed when safe
Slow down and yield the right-of-way before you proceed

questions.question: Traffic in a roundabout always travels:
You approach the scene of an accident where emergency help has arrived. You should:
choices: Use good judgment and keep moving
Slow down to see if you can offer additional help

questions.question: Orange road signs are used:
You are on a narrow street and want to turn around and go in the opposite direction. If there is not enough room for a U-turn, which of the following is your best option?
choices: Use sidewalks to make a safe U-turn
Use a public driveway to turn into

questions.question: These two signs in combination tell you:
What does this sign mean?
You should turn on your headlights when:
If you are involved in a traffic crash, and someone is injured, your first course of action should be:
choices: Move the injured off the roadway
Give aid and call for emergency assistance, if needed

questions.question: Always turn your front wheels away from the curb when you are parked on a grade and facing:
Whenever you drive, you should adjust your speed based on:
If you have been drinking alcohol, what will help you to sober up?
What should you do when approaching a bicyclist from the rear on a two-lane road?
When can you share the lane and drive beside a motorcyclist?
What can you do to alert another driver to turn on the headlights?
What does this sign mean?
Before you reach the exit ramp on an expressway, you should signal your exit for:
A traffic signal with a flashing red circle has the same meaning as:
What is the background color of a road sign guiding you to parks and recreation areas?
When are broken white lines used as pavement marking between lanes?
choices: When traffic is flowing in opposite directions

questions.question: If your car starts to skid, you should ease off the gas and:
choices: Stay off the brake and steer in the opposite direction of the skid
Stay off the brake and steer off the road
Stay off the brake and steer in the direction you want to go

questions.question: You must stop before railroad tracks:
choices: Even when the tracks are out-of-service
If your vehicle has three or more axles
Any time a train may be approaching

questions.question: Massachusetts suspension rules apply to out-of-state violations, even if the offense did not cause a suspension in the other state.
If you sell your vehicle and want to transfer the plates to another vehicle you own, you must do so:
What does this sign mean?
How do safety belts help you as a driver?
choices: They help you stay behind the wheel in case of an accident
They help to prevent all types of traffic accidents
They help you get to your destination faster

questions.question: When an emergency vehicle using flashing lights approaches you from behind, you must:
choices: Pull over to the right edge of the roadway and stop
Drive to the right edge of the road and slow down
Proceed at normal speed, the emergency vehicle will move over to pass

questions.question: This sign means:
What does this sign mean?
When making a turn at an intersection:
choices: Other vehicles must yield the right-of-way
Slow down in mid-turn and change lanes
Do not swing wide through the intersection

questions.question: What do the light gray areas in the picture mark?
